bolts

Interface Continuation<TTaskResult,TContinuationResult>


  • public interface Continuation<TTaskResult,TContinuationResult>
    A function to be called after a task completes. If you wish to have the Task from a Continuation that does not return a Task be cancelled then throw a CancellationException from the Continuation.
    See Also:
    Task
